changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, base_table.id, base_table.name, base_table.description, base_table.notes, base_table.fail_parent, base_table.propagate_children, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM status_code base_table JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
